pure interface of class zeta.format.Format

The documentated page. 
public abstract class Format
  implements Serializable
{
    public static final Format empty;
    public static final Format brk;
    public static Format space(int width);
    public static final Format space;
    public static Format literal(String s);
    public static Format text(String s,
                              String delimiters);
    public static Format buildFormat(Object object);
    public static <A> Format build(A object);
    public static Format buildFormat(FormatInfo info,
                                     Object object);
    public static Format beneath(Format[] subformats);
    public static Format beneath(Aggregate<Format> subformats);
    public static Format beneath(Format f1,
                                 Format f2);
    public static Format beneath(Format f1,
                                 Format f2,
                                 Format f3);
    public static Format beneath(Format f1,
                                 Format f2,
                                 Format f3,
                                 Format f4);
    public static Format block(Format[] subformats);
    public static Format block(Aggregate<Format> subformats);
    public static Format block(Format f1,
                               Format f2);
    public static Format block(Format f1,
                               Format f2,
                               Format f3);
    public static Format block(Format f1,
                               Format f2,
                               Format f3,
                               Format f4);
    public static Format line(Format[] subformats);
    public static Format line(Aggregate<Format> subformats);
    public static Format line(Format f1,
                              Format f2);
    public static Format line(Format f1,
                              Format f2,
                              Format f3);
    public static Format line(Format f1,
                              Format f2,
                              Format f3,
                              Format f4);
    public static Format beside(Format[] subformats);
    public static Format beside(Aggregate<Format> subformats);
    public static Format beside(Format f1,
                                Format f2);
    public static Format beside(Format f1,
                                Format f2,
                                Format f3);
    public static Format beside(Format f1,
                                Format f2,
                                Format f3,
                                Format f4);
    public static Format group(Format[] formats);
    public static Format append(Format[] subformats);
    public static Format append(Aggregate<Format> subformats);
    public static Format append(Format f1,
                                Format f2);
    public static Format append(Format f1,
                                Format f2,
                                Format f3);
    public static Format append(Format f1,
                                Format f2,
                                Format f3,
                                Format f4);
    public Format setIndent(int indent);
    public Format indent(int indent);
    public static Format indent(Format fmt);
    public static <A> Format list(Format open,
                                  Format next,
                                  Format close,
                                  (A) -> Format fmt,
                                  Aggregate<A> agg);
    public static Format list(Format open,
                              Format next,
                              Format close,
                              Aggregate<Object> objects);
    public static Format list(Format open,
                              Format next,
                              Format close,
                              Object[] objects);
    public static Format parenth(boolean yes,
                                 Format fmt);
    public static Pair<Format, int> parenth(Pair<Format, int> p,
                                            int demandedPrio);
    public static Format describe(String message,
                                  String[] infoKeys,
                                  Format[] infos);
    public static Format describe(String message,
                                  String key,
                                  Format info);
    public static Format describe(String message,
                                  String key1,
                                  Format info1,
                                  String key2,
                                  Format info2);
    public static Format describe(String message,
                                  String key1,
                                  Format info1,
                                  String key2,
                                  Format info2,
                                  String key3,
                                  Format info3);
    public static Format describe(String message,
                                  String key1,
                                  Format info1,
                                  String key2,
                                  Format info2,
                                  String key3,
                                  Format info3,
                                  String key4,
                                  Format info4);
    public void printFormat(PrintWriter stream,
                            int width);
    public String toString();
    public String toString(int width);
    public abstract void dumpText(PrintWriter writer);
    public int nesting();
    public abstract int maxWidth();
    public abstract int minWidth();
    public abstract int minHeight();
    public abstract int maxLastWidth();
    public abstract int minLastWidth();
    public abstract TextRectangle printTextBeside(int indentation,
                                                  FormatStream stream,
                                                  int width,
                                                  int lastWidth);
    public abstract int appendText(int indentation,
                                   FormatStream stream);
    public TextRectangle printTextBeside(int indentation,
                                         FormatStream stream,
                                         int width);
    public TextRectangle printText(int indentation,
                                   FormatStream stream,
                                   int width,
                                   int lastWidth);
    public Format();
}
